languages.text: "Во вздохах предсмертных учеников своих слышал я шепот {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающего{/g}. И велел он: омыть Домин в крови того, кому пора уйти, и крови тех, кто был праведен. Ибо сие защитит тебя, Домин'{name}. Закалит тело от бурливой нечистоты. И так я свершил".

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."
languages.original_text: "Во вздохах предсмертных учеников своих слышал я шепот {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающего{/g}. И велел он: омыть Домин в крови того, кому пора уйти, и крови тех, кто был праведен. Ибо сие защитит тебя, Домин'{name}. Закалит тело от бурливой нечистоты. И так я свершил".

traits.locale_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the Immortal One's whisper. He bid me: bathe the Enim in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Enim and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the Immortal One's whisper. He bid me: bathe the Enim in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Enim and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the Immortal One's whisper. He bid me: bathe the Enim in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Enim and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the Immortal One's whisper. He bid me: bathe the Enim in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Enim and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

"In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

languages.text: «En las últimas imágenes de mis aprendices, escuché el susurro del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Inmortal{/g}. Me dio una orden: baña a{mf|l| la} Domin en la sangre de quien debe partir y ha sido justo, pues protegerá a{mf|l| la} Domin y reforzará su cuerpo contra la impureza turbulenta. Y yo obedecí».
languages.original_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: «En las últimas imágenes de mis aprendices, escuché el susurro del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Inmortal{/g}. Me dio una orden: baña a{mf|l| la} Domin en la sangre de quien debe partir y ha sido justo, pues protegerá a{mf|l| la} Domin y reforzará su cuerpo contra la impureza turbulenta. Y yo obedecí».

«En las últimas imágenes de mis aprendices, escuché el susurro del Inmortal. Me dio una orden: baña a{mf|l| la} Enim en la sangre de quien debe partir y ha sido justo, pues protegerá a{mf|l| la} Enim y reforzará su cuerpo contra la impureza turbulenta. Y yo obedecí».

languages.text: 「弟子達の最後のひと息に、{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不滅の者{/g}のささやきを聞いた。彼は私に命じたのだ。行くべき者と正しい者の血をドミンに浴びせよ。そうすることでドミンを守り、騒々しい穢れに対して{mf|彼|彼女}の体を強くする。私はそれに従ったまでだ」
languages.original_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: 「弟子達の最後のひと息に、{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不滅の者{/g}のささやきを聞いた。彼は私に命じたのだ。行くべき者と正しい者の血をドミンに浴びせよ。そうすることでドミンを守り、騒々しい穢れに対して{mf|彼|彼女}の体を強くする。私はそれに従ったまでだ」
「弟子達の最後のひと息に、不滅の者のささやきを聞いた。彼は私に命じたのだ。行くべき者と正しい者の血をエニムに浴びせよ。そうすることでエニムを守り、騒々しい穢れに対して{mf|彼|彼女}の体を強くする。私はそれに従ったまでだ」

languages.text: “在那些学徒最后的叹息声中，我听到了{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死之神{/g}的低语。祂吩咐我，要让秘者沐浴在消逝之人与义人的鲜血之中。这么做可以保佑秘者，强化{mf|他|她}的躯体，让{mf|他|她}免受污秽之物的侵扰，于是我服从了命令。”
languages.original_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: “在那些学徒最后的叹息声中，我听到了{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死之神{/g}的低语。祂吩咐我，要让秘者沐浴在消逝之人与义人的鲜血之中。这么做可以保佑秘者，强化{mf|他|她}的躯体，让{mf|他|她}免受污秽之物的侵扰，于是我服从了命令。”
“在那些学徒最后的叹息声中，我听到了{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不朽之神{/g}的低语。祂吩咐我，要让秘者沐浴在消逝之人与义人的鲜血之中。这么做可以保佑秘者，强化{mf|他|她}的躯体，让{mf|他|她}免受污秽之物的侵扰，于是我服从了命令。”

languages.text: "Im letzten Seufzen meiner Lehrlinge habe ich das Flüstern des {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Todlosen{/g} gehört. Er hat mir befohlen: Badet {mf|den|die} Domin im Blut des Mannes, der gehen muss, und derer, die rechtschaffen waren, denn dies wird {mf|den|die} Domin schützen und {mf|seinen|ihren} Körper gegen das wirbelnde Unsaubere stärken. Ich habe gehorcht."
languages.original_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: "Im letzten Seufzen meiner Lehrlinge habe ich das Flüstern des {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Todlosen{/g} gehört. Er hat mir befohlen: Badet {mf|den|die} Domin im Blut des Mannes, der gehen muss, und derer, die rechtschaffen waren, denn dies wird {mf|den|die} Domin schützen und {mf|seinen|ihren} Körper gegen das wirbelnde Unsaubere stärken. Ich habe gehorcht."

"Im letzten Seufzen meiner Lehrlinge habe ich das Flüstern des Todlosen gehört. Er hat mir befohlen: Badet {mf|den|die} Enim im Blut des Mannes, der gehen muss, und derer, die rechtschaffen waren, denn dies wird {mf|den|die} Enim schützen und {mf|seinen|ihren} Körper gegen das wirbelnde Unsaubere stärken. Ich habe gehorcht."

languages.text: « Dans le dernier soupir de mes apprentis, j'ai perçu les murmures de l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Immortel{/g}. Il m'a ordonné d'oindre {mf|le|la} Domin dans le sang mêlé des justes et de celui qui devait disparaître afin de {mf|le|la} protéger et de l'immuniser contre l'abjection rampante. Je n'ai fait que Lui obéir. »
languages.original_text: "In my apprentices' last sighs, I heard the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}'s whisper. He bid me: bathe the Domin in the blood of he who must go and they who have been righteous, for this will shield the Domin and strengthen {mf|his|her} body against the roiling unclean. I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: « Dans le dernier soupir de mes apprentis, j'ai perçu les murmures de l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Immortel{/g}. Il m'a ordonné d'oindre {mf|le|la} Domin dans le sang mêlé des justes et de celui qui devait disparaître afin de {mf|le|la} protéger et de l'immuniser contre l'abjection rampante. Je n'ai fait que Lui obéir. »

« Dans le dernier soupir de mes apprentis, j'ai perçu les murmures de l'Immortel. Il m'a ordonné d'oindre l'Enim dans le sang mêlé des justes et de celui qui devait disparaître afin de {mf|le|la} protéger et de l'immuniser contre l'abjection rampante. Je n'ai fait que Lui obéir. »
